message.body: Hey! Would it be okay if I give you my yoga mat after tonight's class to keep at your office until Monday? I would like to run home tonight after class
Thank you so much! Really appreciate it!
Sooo not to be negative but...is it just me or was that class pretty bad??
It was horrible! I really didn't like her
Ugh me either. There was no flow! And no music! And bright lights wahhh
No flow whatsoever. I never knew what we were doing because she kept throwing out yoga terminology knowing that we were new to yoga. It was as if she wan
ted to show off. I did not enjoy it
Me either....so not what I had been looking forward to. I guess now we know to avoid her classes!!
